name: HP 14″Rose Gold Lightweight Laptop, with Office 365 & Copilot AI, Intel Processor, 4GB RAM Memory, 64GB SSD + 1TB Cloud Storage
short_description: Elegant Rose Gold Design — Modern, Clean & Stylish: A soft Rose Gold finish adds a modern and elegant look to your workspace, making it ideal for students, young professionals, and anyone who prefers a clean and aesthetic setup

Lightweight & Portable — Easy to Carry for School or Travel: Slim and lightweight design fits easily into backpacks, making it perfect for school, commuting, library study sessions, travel, and everyday use.
4GB Memory: Equipped with 4GB memory to deliver stable, energy-efficient performance for everyday tasks such as web browsing, online learning, document editing, and video calls.

64GB SSD Storage: Built-in 64GB SSD provides faster system startup and quick access to applications and files, offering practical local storage for daily work, school, and home use while pairing well with cloud storage options.

Windows 11 with Copilot AI + 1TB OneDrive Cloud Storage: Preloaded with Windows 11 and Copilot AI to help with research, summaries, and everyday productivity, plus 1TB of OneDrive cloud storage for safely backing up school projects and important documents.

name: Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3 - Everyday Laptop - Lightweight - Windows 11-15.6" FHD - 8GB Memory - 256GB Storage - AMD Ryzen 5 7520U - Abyss Blue
short_description: SMART MULTITASKING: Work smart and seamlessly on multiple tasks with the latest AMD Ryzen 5 7520U processor and 8GB of memory. Featuring a slim, lightweight and military-grade resilient design.
AMPLE STORAGE: With 256GB of storage there is no shortage for your projects, family photos and memories.
SEE MORE, LEARN MORE: Learn more about the world with the FHD IPS display, while keeping your eyes safe with TÜV-certified Low Blue Light.
LEARN SMARTER: Smarter learning starts with smart features from Lenovo AI Engine to enhance power, display, voice, and wireless connections.
CRYSTAL CLEAR AUDIO: Integrated Dolby Audio with two built in 2W speakers and a dual microphone make the audio clearer than ever.

A PC MADE RESPONSIBLY: The ENERGY STAR rated and EPEAT Silver-registered IdeaPad Slim 3 is built with 30% post-consumer recycled plastic in the bottom cover and the power adapter case, plus 30% ocean-bound plastic in the system bag.
THE SMARTER CHOICE FOR MOBILITY: The slim, lightweight and military-grade resilient IdeaPad Slim 3 is built for smart and heavy work and study on the go.
SECURITY WHERE IT COUNTS: Built in Fingerprint reader helps keep your computer secure.
FASTER AND FURTHER: Go faster and farther with full-function Type-C port, larger touchpad, 2-in-1 fingerprint sensor and Rapid Charge Boost.
product_description: The Smarter Choice for Mobility. The IdeaPad Slim 3 lets you work, study, and play anywhere in the world with a lightweight and thin profile. Take care of important business with the powerful AMD Ryzen 5 7520U processor, enhanced with the adaptive performance of Smart Power on an 15.6" FHD display.

name: HP Ultrabook, Intel CPU, 16GB RAM, 1.6TB Storage (64GB OnBoard w/ 512GB Portable Drive + 1TB OneDrive), Up to 12 hrs Battery, Windows 11 Home, Snowflake White, w/WOWPC 3-in-1 Bundle
short_description: Work in Comfort: With the 14" HD Screen, you can relax and optimize your workload with a year's subscription of Microsot Office 365 in crystal clear HD resolution.
Expand Your Storage on Us: This laptop includes 128GB of built-in storage, a separate 512GB external hard drive, and 1TB OneDrive Cloud Storage so you won't be incovenienced by storage shortages

Ultra-Portable with Long Battery Life: Lightweight at just 3.24 pounds and 0.71 inches thin, featuring a battery that lasts up to 12 hours, this laptop is the perfect fit for both students and professionals on the go.

Enhanced Connectivity and Portability: Features multiple ports including USB-C and HDMI for versatile connections, along with a sleek, slim, and smooth design that’s easy to carry and stylish to display.

Complete Accessory Package for Ultimate Convenience: Alongside the laptop, this package includes a set of valuable accessories to enhance your computing experience. You'll receive a 512GB external hard drive for additional storage, a microfiber cloth for keeping your screen clean and smudge-free, and a hotkey sticker sheet to speed up your workflow.
